            • Method Detail

              • java.lang.Object append(D instance, java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.Object element, java.util.Map params = [:])

                Add the specified element to the instance's embedded list, set or map and generate an update for the datastore

                Parameters:
                instance - the instance containing the collection or map
                propertyName - the name of the embedded list, set or map
                element - the element to add
                params - The parameters

              • java.lang.Object deleteFrom(D instance, java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.Object item, boolean isIndex, java.util.Map params = [:])

                Remove the specified element, or the element at the specified index, from the instance's embedded list, set or map and generate an update for the datastore

                Parameters:
                instance - the instance containing the collection or map
                propertyName - the name of the embedded list, set or map
                item - the element or index of the element to remove in the case of a list, the element in the case of a set or map
                isIndex - whether the specified item is an element or the index of the element to remove, only true if removing from a list using index, false otherwise
                params - The parameters

              • protected D doSave(D instance, java.util.Map params, org.grails.datastore.mapping.core.Session s, boolean isInsert = false)

              • java.lang.Object prepend(D instance, java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.Object element, java.util.Map params = [:])

                Prepend the specified element to the instance's embedded list and generate an update for the datastore

                Parameters:
                instance - the instance containing the list
                propertyName - the name of the embedded list
                element - the element to prepend
                params - The parameters

              • java.lang.Object replaceAt(D instance, java.lang.String propertyName, int index, java.lang.Object element, java.util.Map params = [:])

                Replace the specified element at the specified index in the instance's embedded list and generate an update for the datastore

                Parameters:
                instance - the instance containing the list
                propertyName - the name of the embedded list
                index - the index of the element to replace
                element - the element to be stored at the specified index
                params - The parameters

              • D save(D instance, java.util.Map params)

                Saves an object with the given parameters

                Parameters:
                instance - The instance
                params - The parameters
                Returns:
                The instance

              • D update(D instance, java.util.Map params = [:])

                Update an instance without loading into the session

                Parameters:
                instance - The instance
                params - The parameters
                Returns:
                Returns the instance

              • D updateSingleTypes(D instance, java.util.Map params = [:])

                params - The parameters
                Returns:
